nodes.text: Troya Ajak was a Human female Ash'ad warrior and former Mandalorian who lived during the Third Galactic War.

In 3626 BBY, Troya Ajak and the Ash'ad joined in on an attack on the Mandalorian ship the Spirit of Vengeance II alongside Clan Varad and the Dar'manda at the behest of Heta Kol in exchange for Mandalorian relics, which Ajak considered symbols of honor and a reminder of what the Mandalorians once were. There she encountered the Alliance Commander and Rass Ordo, who she engaged in combat. The fight ended with her death.
